spec_data.Name: publican
spec_data.Description:
Publican is a DocBook publication system, not just a DocBook processing tool.
As well as ensuring your DocBook XML is valid, publican works to ensure
your XML is up to publishable standard.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 10:55:33 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Common files and scripts for publishing with DocBook XML
